Yea this is all real and everything, the reason its around in case anyone didn't know is because Fileplanet fucked up and put it up for download despite the key system not even being active, so they took it down shortly afterwards. Without the keys this is pretty useless but, still might be worth downloading it now because when the keys go live the FP servers are going to be backed up to hell.

I'll also mention that the game has adverts just like Battlefield 2142! It says so in the read-me file under the copyright section, when it talks about Massive software or something. Check it out.

Add these entries to your hosts file, located in windows/system32/drivers/etc:

127.0.0.1   	madserver.net
127.0.0.1   	ad.madserver.net
127.0.0.1  	imp.madserver.net
127.0.0.1   	media.madserver.net

Should stop the ads from loading. Also, thanks for this, because fuck fileplanet. Better to get it now than wait in line forever.

so far there is no way to get a server started as there was with the stalker leaked beta, hopefully that will change soon. if i hear of anything i will post it here.

it seems id has taken out a bunch of commands for the beta, probably to stop the exact thing we are all trying to do now ;)

to bring up the console hit ctrl+alt+tilde (squigly line under escape for most people)

you can also press alt+enter to set it to a windowed mode, so you can alt+tab between the game and whatever else youre doing to help you mess with it.
What about the license code? Does anyone can post it here?

commands that i have tested & are 100% working

set com_showFPS "1" (shows the fps)
set com_allowConsole "1" (allows you to access console with JUST the tilde key)
connect ip:port (lets you connect to a server if one exists, havnt found one anywhere)
benchmark
game_memory
dir
gfxInfo


write protected commands (cant set new values)
net_serverdedicated
set si_map

unknowns
servermaprestart (when typed into console the message "server is not running - use spawnServer" appears, however spawnServer isnt a valid command)


dont feel like testing anymore, however i found these commands list EVERY single command inside the game, so you can just try more for yourselves maybe will stumble onto something.

listCmds              
listCvars             
listGameCmds          
listSystemCmds        

hope this helps.
